title: Reverse a String (Python) #1
code:
```python
text = 'Hello'
reversed_text = text[::-1]
print(reversed_text)
```

title: Swap Two Variables (Python) #2
code:
```python
a, b = 5, 10
a, b = b, a
print(a, b)
```

title: Check for Palindrome (Python) #3
code:
```python
def is_palindrome(s):
    return s == s[::-1]

print(is_palindrome('level'))
```

title: Count Elements in a List (Python) #4
code:
```python
items = ['a', 'b', 'a', 'c', 'b']
from collections import Counter
print(Counter(items))
```

title: Flatten a List of Lists (Python) #5
code:
```python
nested = [[1, 2], [3, 4], [5]]
flat = [item for sublist in nested for item in sublist]
print(flat)
```

title: Find the Largest Element in a List (Python) #6
code:
```python
numbers = [1, 5, 3, 9, 2]
print(max(numbers))
```

title: Sort a List (Python) #7
code:
```python
numbers = [4, 2, 9, 1, 5]
numbers.sort()
print(numbers)
```

title: Create a Simple Class (Python) #8
code:
```python
class Dog:
    def __init__(self, name, breed):
        self.name = name
        self.breed = breed

dog = Dog('Buddy', 'Labrador')
print(dog.name, dog.breed)
```

title: Filter Even Numbers in a List (Python) #9
code:
```python
numbers = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]
even_numbers = [n for n in numbers if n % 2 == 0]
print(even_numbers)
```

title: Read a File (Python) #10
code:
```python
with open('file.txt', 'r') as file:
    content = file.read()
print(content)
```

title: Write to a File (Python) #11
code:
```python

```
